hello: Lovely to meet you at last.
I've heard so much about you!
bad: Oh... What has got you feeling down?
you: I am still being programmed, but other than that, I feel great!
Is that meant to be funny?
nice: Nice? I've never heard that before.
game: Unfortunately, bots can not play video or physical games, do you play any games?
why: I've never thought about that before. I'll get back to you.
That's the question on everyone's lips.
I'm sorry I don't understand what you mean.
